faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Got questions about our ai baby dance video generator free tool? We've got answers for everything you need to know.

items.question: Is BabyBoogey's AI baby dance video generator really 100% free?
items.answer: Yes, genuinely free! BabyBoogey offers a free tier that lets you create baby dance videos with no credit card and no sign-up required. Free exports include a small BabyBoogey watermark, and paid plans remove it.

items.question: Do I need to create an account to make baby dance video free?
items.answer: No account needed! Simply visit BabyBoogey, upload your baby's photo, choose a dance template, and download your video. We designed our free baby dance video maker to be as frictionless as possible — open the site and start creating.

items.question: Will there be a watermark on my free baby dance video?
items.answer: Yes, free exports include a small BabyBoogey watermark. This keeps the free tier sustainable and helps us continue offering free credits. Upgrade to any paid plan to remove all watermarks instantly.

items.question: What photo formats work with the free AI baby video generator?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. For the best results, use a clear, front-facing photo with good lighting. The minimum recommended size is 512x512 pixels, but most modern smartphone photos work perfectly right out of the camera.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a baby dance video for free?
items.answer: Most videos are ready in under 30 seconds! Our AI is optimized for speed, so you can create and share baby dance videos almost instantly. No lengthy processing queues or waiting around — the free tier gets the same fast generation as paid plans.

items.question: Is it safe to upload my baby's photo to BabyBoogey?
items.answer: Absolutely. Your photos are processed securely using encrypted connections and are never shared with third parties. Since no account is required for the free tier, we collect minimal data about you. You can trust BabyBoogey with your family's precious moments.

items.question: Can I use the free baby dance video maker for adults or pets too?
items.answer: Yes! While BabyBoogey is optimized for baby photos, our AI face animation technology works great with any clear face photo — toddlers, kids, adults, and even pets with visible faces. Give it a try with the whole family and see who has the best dance moves!

items.question: What's the difference between the free tier and paid plans?
items.answer: The free tier gives you access to core dance templates, watermarked video exports, and standard resolution output. Paid plans unlock premium templates, full 1080p HD exports, longer video durations, priority processing, and watermark-free downloads.
